/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++98   CMakeFiles/TestOpenCLPlumedForce.dir/TestOpenCLPlumedForce.cpp.o  -o TestOpenCLPlumedForce  -L/home/mjharvey/miniconda3/lib  -L/home/mjharvey/miniconda3/lib/plugins -rdynamic ../libOpenMMPlumedOpenCL.so ../../../libOpenMMPlumed.so -lplumed2 /opt/cuda/8.0/lib64/libOpenCL.so -lOpenMM -lOpenMMOpenCL -Wl,-rpath,/home/mjharvey/miniconda3/lib:/home/mjharvey/miniconda3/lib/plugins:/home/mjharvey/working/acellera/openmm-plumed/build/platforms/opencl:/home/mjharvey/working/acellera/openmm-plumed/build:/opt/cuda/8.0/lib64
